abstract: In August alone, Diamondback's main hedge fund lost 7 percent, leaving it down about 5 percent for the year, according to an investor in the fund.
snippet: In August alone, Diamondback's main hedge fund lost 7 percent, leaving it down about 5 percent for the year, according to an investor in the fund.
lead_paragraph: Ever since federal agents stormed into its office late last year, Diamondback Capital Management has been working to stay afloat.

headline.main: Diamondback Beset With Redemptions, Summer Losses
